# 创建 OAuth 应用 

 <p style="text-align: left;">你可以创建和注册一个 OAuth 应用在你的个人账号下。在创建 OAuth 应用时，请记住保护你的个人隐私。</p><blockquote class="lake-alert lake-alert-warning" style="background-color: #FFFBE6;">Waning: OAuth 应用中<span style="background-color: #FFFBE6;">仅使用你认为可以公开的信息，请避免使用敏感数据，例如内部URL</span></blockquote>

 ### 第1步 

<p style="text-align: left;"><span class="lake-fontsize-12"><br></span><span>在任意页面的右上角，</span><span>点击</span><span>你的个人头像，然后</span><span>点击</span> <strong>设置</strong><span>。</span></p><p style="text-align: left;"><span><br></span><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556171888274-7f14bf3c-a471-4d23-aa56-f6d8af56f5b8.png#align=left&display=inline&height=382&originHeight=796&originWidth=450&search=&status=done&width=216" style="max-width: 600px; width: 216px;"></p><p style="text-align: center;"><br></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p>

 ### 第2步 

<p style="text-align: center;"><strong><span class="lake-fontsize-12"><br></span></strong></p><p style="text-align: left;"><span>在左侧边栏中，点击 </span><strong>OAuth应用。</strong></p><p style="text-align: left;"><strong><br></strong><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172018767-62d17902-e449-4a13-8e43-d065cebf34da.png#align=left&display=inline&height=218&originHeight=616&originWidth=610&search=&status=done&width=216" style="max-width: 600px; width: 216px;"></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p>

 ### 第3步 

<p style="text-align: center;"><strong><span class="lake-fontsize-12"><br></span></strong></p><p style="text-align: left;"><span>点击 </span><a href="https://www.yuque.com/settings/applications/new" target="_blank"><strong>新建</strong></a><span>。</span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span><br></span></p><p style="text-align: left;"><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172122033-4b8a046c-ddcb-4c74-8f6e-c8cf5d5e0beb.png#align=left&display=inline&height=46&originHeight=100&originWidth=260&search=&status=done&width=120" style="max-width: 600px; width: 120px;"></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p>

 ### 第4步 

<p style="text-align: left;"><strong><span class="lake-fontsize-12"><br></span></strong><span>在 “应用名”，输入你的应用名称</span></p><p style="text-align: left;"><span><br></span></p><p style="text-align: left;"><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172518216-8ff6647c-9714-4c4f-9153-db6566aba59c.png#align=left&display=inline&height=62&originHeight=174&originWidth=964&search=&status=done&width=343" style="max-width: 600px; width: 343px;"></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p><p style="text-align: left;"><br></p>

 ### 第5步 

<p><span>（可选）在“简介”中，输入用户将看到的应用程序的说明。</span></p><p><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172638277-eb04c45c-94dd-47ac-94a7-a5c4dbebccec.png#align=left&display=inline&height=96&originHeight=276&originWidth=968&search=&status=done&width=338" style="max-width: 600px; width: 338px;"></p>

 ### 第6步 

<p><span>在 “主页”，输入你的应用网站点完整链接</span></p><p><span><br></span><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172498324-03d343c4-4029-4f7d-b80f-4b9aefe6f425.png#align=left&display=inline&height=64&originHeight=176&originWidth=968&search=&status=done&width=352" style="max-width: 600px; width: 352px;"></p>

 ### 第7步 

<p><span>在 “回调”，输入你的应用的回调地址</span></p><p><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172723638-70409722-08cd-4ee9-bd12-17a256910be2.png#align=left&display=inline&height=61&originHeight=172&originWidth=962&search=&status=done&width=340" style="max-width: 600px; width: 340px;"></p>

 ### 第8步 

<p><span>（可选）在“LOGO”中，上传你的应用 Logo。</span></p><p><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172754077-5aed1801-feb1-452b-a9dc-64e9a37224f4.png#align=left&display=inline&height=111&originHeight=222&originWidth=646&search=&status=done&width=323" style="max-width: 600px; width: 323px;"></p>

 ### 第9步 

<p><span>点击 </span><strong>创建应用</strong><span>。</span></p><p><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/84181/1556172858412-c8b2d218-3bc7-4147-b46d-3b33b5aa6809.png#align=left&display=inline&height=53&originHeight=110&originWidth=210&search=&status=done&width=102" style="max-width: 600px; width: 102px;"></p><br><br><a class="yuque-link" target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/developer/create-oauth-apps"><svg viewBox="64 64 896 896" class="" data-icon="yuque" width="1em" height="1em" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M854.6 370.6c-9.9-39.4 9.9-102.2 73.4-124.4l-67.9-3.6s-25.7-90-143.6-98c-117.8-8.1-194.9-3-195-3 .1 0 87.4 55.6 52.4 154.7-25.6 52.5-65.8 95.6-108.8 144.7-1.3 1.3-2.5 2.6-3.5 3.7C319.4 605 96 860 96 860c245.9 64.4 410.7-6.3 508.2-91.1 20.5-.2 35.9-.3 46.3-.3 135.8 0 250.6-117.6 245.9-248.4-3.2-89.9-31.9-110.2-41.8-149.6zm-204.1 334c-10.6 0-26.2.1-46.8.3l-23.6.2-17.8 15.5c-47.1 41-104.4 71.5-171.4 87.6-52.5 12.6-110 16.2-172.7 9.6 18-20.5 36.5-41.6 55.4-63.1 92-104.6 173.8-197.5 236.9-268.5l1.4-1.4 1.3-1.5c4.1-4.6 20.6-23.3 24.7-28.1 9.7-11.1 17.3-19.9 24.5-28.6 30.7-36.7 52.2-67.8 69-102.2l1.6-3.3 1.2-3.4c13.7-38.8 15.4-76.9 6.2-112.8 22.5.7 46.5 1.9 71.7 3.6 33.3 2.3 55.5 12.9 71.1 29.2 5.8 6 10.2 12.5 13.4 18.7 1 2 1.7 3.6 2.3 5l5 17.7c-15.7 34.5-19.9 73.3-11.4 107.2 3 11.8 6.9 22.4 12.3 34.4 2.1 4.7 9.5 20.1 11 23.3 10.3 22.7 15.4 43 16.7 78.7 3.3 94.6-82.7 181.9-182 181.9z"></path></svg> 使用语雀查看</a>
